refnamediv.refpurpose: The devices configuration file for Remote Telescope System, 2nd version

refsect1.title: SYNOPSIS
refsect1.para: The rts2.devices file describes which devices will be started by RTS2 startup script (/etc/init.d/rts2).

refsect1.title: FILE FORMAT
refsect1.para: Format of the file is quite simple. The file contains space separated devices types, device driver name and device options. So one row contains:
where device options and short descriptions are given running rts2-{device type}-{device driver name} -h.

refsect1.title: IMPORTNAT NOTE ABOUT MULTIPLE SERVERS
refsect1.para: You can specify multiple central servers using --server option. That is perfectly legal, but be aware, that if such device will ask central server for blocking information (before executing exposure, moving mount,..), it will ask only the first central server.

refsect1.title: EXAMPLES
refsect1.para: To start up device driver for Gemini telescope called T0 and FLI CCD called C0 with option -l 1, give:
teld gemini T0 camd fli C0 -l 1
